sentences.en: His mother was old, badly dressed and obviously downtrodden.
sentences.cn: 他母亲老了，衣着破旧，显然尝尽了苦难。

sentences.en: The owner is making huge profits at the expense of downtrodden peasants.
sentences.cn: 物主靠压榨农民而赢得暴利。

words.tran_cn: 被践踏的，被蹂躏的；受压迫的

trans.tran_en: downtrodden people are treated badly and without respect by people who have power over them
